feed.title: Mattermost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Mattermost: v9.11.1
entry.content: Mattermost Platform Extended Support Release 9.11.1 contains low to medium severity level security fixes.

entry.title: New release for Mattermost: v10.0.0
entry.content: Mattermost Platform Major Release 10.0.0 includes Mattermost Microsoft Teams Plugin, Microsoft Calendar and Microsoft Teams Meetings Plugins, Copilot GA, and much more.

entry.title: New release for Mattermost: v9.10.3
entry.content: Mattermost Platform Release 9.10.3 contains low to medium severity level security fixes.

entry.title: New release for Mattermost: v9.5.10
entry.content: Mattermost Platform Extended Support Release 9.5.10 contains low to medium severity level security fixes.

entry.title: New release for Mattermost: v9.11.2
